___^_.description: Any property starting with _ is valid.

title: JSON schema for Bower configuration files

___ignore.description: A list of files for Bower to ignore when installing your package.

___main.description: The primary acting files necessary to use your package.

___license.description: SPDX license identifier or path/url to a license.

___devDependencies.description: Dependencies that are only needed for development of the package, e.g., test framework or building documentation.

___authors.description: A list of people that authored the contents of the package.

___dependencies.description: Dependencies are specified with a simple hash of package name to a semver compatible identifier or URL.

___moduleType.description: The types of modules this package exposes

___resolutions.description: Dependency versions to automatically resolve with if conflicts occur between packages.

___exportsOverride.description: Used by grunt-bower-task to specify custom install locations.

___private.description: If you set it to  true  it will refuse to publish it. This is a way to prevent accidental publication of private repositories.

___description.description: Help users identify and search for your package with a brief description.

___repository.description: The repository in which the source code can be found.

___keywords.description: Used for search by keyword. Helps make your package easier to discover without people needing to know its name.

___homepage.description: URL to learn more about the package. Falls back to GitHub project if not specified and it's a GitHub endpoint.
